long_description: Roomy and laptop-ready, the REI Full Lode Daypack comfortably handles your daily gear whether you're a student, professional or well-supplied traveler. Main compartment has a sleeve that holds most 15.6 in. laptops; alternatively, the sleeve can hold a hydration reservoir. An inner mesh sleeve can hold most tablets; sleeve is positioned away from the pack edges for protection. Buckle-up front stash pocket can be used to stow a jacket. Pack also has 2 zip front pockets; one includes an organizer panel for pens, electronics and other small items. A mesh pocket on each side can hold a water bottle. Comfortable back panel has dual-density padding with ventilation channels. Adjustable shoulder straps are padded and contoured; waistbelt can be tucked away when not needed. Pack has reflective trim; it also includes a clip loop for an LED safety light (sold separately). Finishing touches on the REI Full Lode Daypack include outer compression straps and strap keepers that secure the shoulder straps' webbing tails.
short_description: Roomy and laptop-ready, the REI Full Lode Daypack comfortably handles your daily gear whether you're a student, professional or well-supplied traveler.
